title: Discord will switch to temporary file links to block malware delivery
description: Discord will switch to temporary file links for all users by the end of the year to block attackers from using its CDN (content delivery network) for hosting and pushing malware. [...]

title: Apple 'Find My' network can be abused to steal keylogged passwords
description: Apple's "Find My" location network can be abused by malicious actors to stealthily transmit sensitive information captured by keyloggers installed in keyboards. [...]
